participant_1.background:
I am a small business owner trying to make my mark in the horse racing industry.
I am a married woman who is struggling in my women's studies class but is happy with her life.
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
I am proud of my mixed heritage and wouldn't want to be any other way.
i am currently on a diet.

participant_2.background:
I need to find a more constructive way to deal with my emotions.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.
I am sad my dog died but I still enjoy playing sports even though I'm allergic to apples.
I try to stay fit and healthy by cooking nutritious meals and lifting weights.
I am from a place where rain is always welcome.

content.text: Hi! Hope you're having a great day!
I am, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a long walk in the rain.
Oh, that sounds relaxing! I would love to go on a walk in the rain but I just broke my leg.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. How did you break it?
I fell down the stairs. I'm currently on a diet and I think I lost my balance.
Oh, that's awful! I'm so sorry. I hope you heal quickly.
Thanks. I'm trying to stay positive. I'm just glad that I'm not in any pain.
That's good to hear. Do you have any hobbies that you can do while you're recovering?
Yes, I enjoy tending to my flower beds. It helps me to clear my mind.
That's a great hobby! I love gardening too. It's so relaxing.
Yes, it is. I'm glad that I have something to keep me occupied while I'm recovering.
I'm sure you'll be back on your feet in no time!
Thank you! I appreciate your encouragement.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great rest of your day!
